"Here Comes the Sun" by The Beatles - This song represents the dawn of a new chapter in my life, full of hope and optimism. The lyrics evoke a sense of renewal and freedom, perfect for a fresh start.
"Lose Yourself" by Eminem - This intense and motivational anthem would be included to push me through challenging times, reminding me to stay focused and driven.

"I Will Always Love You" by Whitney Houston - This powerful ballad would be a tribute to the people who have made a lasting impact on my life, serving as a reminder of the love and connections that make life worth living.
"Uptown Funk" by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars - This funky hit would be included to bring a touch of playfulness and joy to my life, encouraging me to let loose and have fun.

"Viva la Vida" by Coldplay - This epic song would be a reflection of my own journey, with its themes of transformation and self-discovery. It would remind me to stay curious and open to new experiences. [/INST]
